Winning Mega Millions lotto tickets sold in Md., Kan., Ill.

Lottery ticket-holders in Kansas, Illinois, and Maryland each selected the winning numbers and will split a $640 million jackpot, a lottery official said. (AP, 12:59 p.m.)
  • The winning numbers: 2, 4, 23, 38, 46, Mega Ball 23

Fla. protesters march for Trayvon Martin

About a thousand protesters are marching in Sanford, Fla., the town where 17-year-old Trayvon Martin was killed by a neighborhood watch volunteer. (AP, 11:29 a.m.)

Cape Wind deal to add to NStar bills

NStar agreed to pay a starting price for power from the Cape Wind project that is substantially above the cost of conventional energy. (Boston Globe)

MOVIE REVIEW

'Kid With a Bike' is a masterful ride

  A young boy is abandoned by his father. It sounds tragic, but this Cannes prizewinner is, remarkably, about hope - about the connections people forge when the ones they’ve been given desert them.
